Validate Data Structure for sim_heat Functions

Source: R/sim_helper_classes.R
validate_sim_heat_data.Rd

Validate Data Structure for sim_heat Functions

Usage

validate_sim_heat_data(df)

Arguments

df

Data frame to validate containing patient data

Value

TRUE if validation passes, otherwise throws an error with descriptive message

Details

Performs validation checks for sim_heat and sim_heat_alt functions including:

  • Required column presence

  • Column data types

  • Initialization state

Required columns:

  • arrival_minute (numeric, added by init)

  • resolve_minute (numeric, added by init)

  • priority_binary (factor, added by init)

  • loset (logical)

  • observed_wait_time (numeric, added by init)

  • unit (factor)
